channel.title: Carnival of Terror help

item.title: Carnival of Terror help
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

Yep, as Spky said, if statements only allow use for the condition after it.

So, the variables x, and y will be reset after the if statement. In order to remember this, I usually put my if statements with one condition after it on the same line.

Example:

if(ThisIsTrue) then MoveMouse(x,y);

Instead of:

if(ThisIsTrue) then MoveMouse(x,y);
They both do the same thing, but I find it helps me clean up my code, and remember it easier.

But if I was trying to excecute multiple conditions if something is true, then I would do what Spky said, and use if…then…begin…stuff…end.

Read full topic

item.title: Carnival of Terror help
item.dc:creator: @Spky Spky
item.description:
@Spky wrote:

program carnofterror; var x,y: integer; begin repeat if(findcolor(x,y,5032943,5,5,25,25))then movemouse(x,y); clickmouse(x,y,true); if(findcolor(x,y,164,5,5,25,25))then movemouse(x,y); clickmouse(x,y,true); if(findcolor(x,y,6912947,5,5,25,25))then movemouse(x,y); clickmouse(x,y,true); until(false) end.

The reason the mouse moves to the corner is because you havn’t include the ClickMouse in the if.
Example:

if(SomethingHappens)then Writeln('Something has happend!'); Writeln('Something might not have happend');

Should in your case be:

if(SomethingHappens)then begin Writeln('Something has happend!'); Writeln('Something might not have happend'); end;

Read full topic

item.title: Carnival of Terror help
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

program carnofterror; var x,y: integer; begin repeat if(findcolor(x,y,5032943,5,5,25,25))then clickmouse(x,y,true); if(findcolor(x,y,164,5,5,25,25))then clickmouse(x,y,true); if(findcolor(x,y,6912947,5,5,25,25))then clickmouse(x,y,true); until(false) end.

That does the same thing pretty much, try this.

item.title: Carnival of Terror help
item.dc:creator: @boopyg boopyg
item.description:
@boopyg wrote:

The first major script I have made in about a year are having problems. It goes to the corner of the window I chose for it. Please help me.

program carnofterror;
var x,y: integer;
begin
repeat
if(findcolor(x,y,5032943,5,5,25,25))then
movemouse(x,y);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
if(findcolor(x,y,164,5,5,25,25))then
movemouse(x,y);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
if(findcolor(x,y,6912947,5,5,25,25))then
movemouse(x,y);
clickmouse(x,y,true);
until(false)
end.

Read full topic
